Uses of Class
chess.ChessPiece

Packages that use ChessPiece
Package Description
application  
chess
This package corresponds to the chess layer.
chess.pieces
the package chess.pieces will contain the classes that will represent each type of chess piece.

  • Uses of ChessPiece in application

    Methods in application with parameters of type ChessPiece
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void UI.printBoard​(ChessPiece[][] piecesMatrix)
    prints on the terminal screen, the matrix of chess pieces passed as method parameter.
    static void UI.printBoard​(ChessPiece[][] piecesMatrix, boolean[][] possibleMoves)
    prints on the terminal screen, the matrix of chess pieces passed as method parameter, in addition to indication of the possible movements of the movement's source piece.
    private static void UI.printPiece​(ChessPiece piece, boolean background)
    prints a chess piece.
    Method parameters in application with type arguments of type ChessPiece
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private static void UI.printCapturedPieces​(java.util.List<ChessPiece> capturedPieces)
    Prints the black and white pieces that were captured in the game.
    static void UI.printMatch​(ChessMatch chessMatch, java.util.List<ChessPiece> captured)
    It will print the board through the UI.printBoard(ChessPiece[][]) method, the indicator of the pieces captured through the UI.printCapturedPieces(List) method and if there has not been a checkmate (and this will be checked using ChessMatch.getCheckMate()) it will print respectively through the ChessMatch.getTurn() and ChessMatch.getCheck() methods, a message that will say which player is the current turn and also warn if there is a check.

    returns an matrix of chess pieces.
    ChessPiece ChessMatch.getPromoted()  
    private ChessPiece ChessMatch.king​(Color color)
    this method will find the king of the color passed as a parameter.
    private ChessPiece ChessMatch.newPiece​(java.lang.String type, Color color)
    Will return a piece given a symbol of the type of the piece and also a color
    ChessPiece ChessMatch.performChessMove​(ChessPosition sourcePosition, ChessPosition targetPosition)
    contains all the logic of validating and moving a piece, in a chess move.
    ChessPiece ChessMatch.replacePromotedPiece​(java.lang.String type)
    replace a piece promoted by a queen, knight, rook, or bishop of the same color.
    Methods in chess with parameters of type ChessPiece
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void ChessMatch.placeNewPiece​(char column, int row, ChessPiece piece)
    Put a chess piece on the board using the chess coordinate system.
